distinct_auth_attempts: distinct_auth_attempts := STATS_MEAN( REDUCE(profile, (s, x) -> STATS_ADD(s, HLLP_CARDINALITY(x)) ,STATS_INIT()))

riskLevelRules.name: Too many distinct auth attempts: non-regular user
riskLevelRules.reason: FORMAT('The distinct number of machines that user %s attempted to login to (%d) is more than 5 standard deviations (%.2f) from the median (%.2f)', user, TO_INTEGER(distinct_auth_attempts), distinct_auth_attempts_stddev, distinct_auth_attempts_median)

riskLevelRules.name: Too many distinct auth attempts: regular user
riskLevelRules.reason: FORMAT('The distinct number of machines that user %s attempted to login to (%d) is more than 5 standard deviations (%.2f) from the median (%.2f)', user, TO_INTEGER(distinct_auth_attempts), distinct_auth_attempts_stddev, distinct_auth_attempts_median)
